title: Police investigating after piece of a pig turns up in Newton park
author: Carson Lyle
bullets: Newton police are investigating a pig leg or flank found near Flowed Meadow at Auburndale Park.
A red flag and note accompanied the meat; its purpose remains unclear to authorities.
Hunting on conservation land, including Newton parks, is prohibited under Massachusetts law.

title: Jaylen Brown, Payton Pritchard dominate in blowout win over Lakers: 7 takeaways
author: Tom Westerholm
bullets: Jaylen Brown led the Celtics with 32 points, despite shooting 10-for-28, in a 111-89 victory over the Lakers.
Payton Pritchard excelled off the bench, scoring 30 points and maintaining an average of 23.5 points over seven games.
Nikola Vucevic played 20 minutes, scoring nine points and grabbing eight rebounds as Neemias Queta took most center minutes.

title: These Mass. schools are closed on Monday, Feb. 23
author: Audrey Cooney
bullets: Major snowstorm prompts closure of dozens of Massachusetts school districts on Monday, Feb. 23.
Closed districts include Boston, Cambridge, Worcester, and Springfield among many others in the region.
For updates on additional closures, residents are encouraged to report unlisted schools via email.

title: Fall River police searching for man accused of shooting, killing dog
author: Carson Lyle
bullets: Fall River police search for Kyron Simmons, 36, accused of shooting and killing a dog at Sunset Hill Housing.
Simmons faces charges including home invasion, animal cruelty, and firearm offenses, police confirmed through video and evidence.
An arrest warrant is active; Simmons is considered armed and dangerous, police warn and seek public assistance.

title: Greater Boston town issues guidance after bobcat sighting
author: Carson Lyle
bullets: Dedham Animal Control reported a bobcat sighting near Deerpath Road and Route 109 in Dedham, Massachusetts.
Residents were advised to follow safe wildlife practices due to a known bobcat population in Dedham and surrounding areas.
Authorities recommend eliminating outdoor food sources and supervising pets to avoid wildlife encounters during bobcat mating season.

title: Alex Cora gives an early preview of Red Sox 2026 lineup
author: Conor Ryan
bullets: Red Sox manager Alex Cora hints at 2026 season lineup with Roman Anthony and Trevor Story at the top.
Trevor Story expected in No. 2 spot after a successful 2025 season, batting .263 with 25 home runs.
Cora highlights Isiah Kiner-Falefa in lineup, despite top prospect Marcelo Mayer sidelined due to performance.

title: Live updates: What to know about the nor’easter hitting Massachusetts
author: Molly Farrar
bullets: Massachusetts bracing for nor'easter bringing 18-24 inches of snow, high winds, possible power outages, especially in southeast areas.
Boston declared snow emergency; schools and city buildings closed, with parking bans in effect starting Sunday at 2 p.m.
MBTA operating on emergency schedule during storm; subways, buses affected, ferries suspended; commute delays expected.

title: Bruins react to McAvoy, Swayman’s gold-medal win over Canada
author: Conor Ryan
bullets: Charlie McAvoy and Jeremy Swayman won Olympic gold with Team USA, marking their first win since 1980.
McAvoy played a key defensive role with significant ice time and a crucial play preventing a Canadian goal.
Bruins teammates and staff celebrated their win at Warrior Ice Arena as Team USA defeated Canada 2-1 in overtime.

title: 2026 NFL Mock Draft roundup: 7 names for Patriots fans to know entering combine week
author: Conor Roche
bullets: Patriots hold the No. 31 pick in the 2026 NFL Draft with focus on trenches.
Daniel Jeremiah suggests Patriots select Zion Young, an EDGE from Missouri, for defensive need.
Yahoo Sports proposes Patriots draft Oregon TE Kenyon Sadiq for his pass-catching ability.

title: Team USA writes a new chapter and other takeaways from gold-medal triumph over Canada
author: Conor Ryan
bullets: Team USA men's hockey wins its first Olympic Gold Medal since 1980, defeating Canada 2-1 in Milan.
Jack Hughes scores the golden goal in 3-on-3 overtime, aided by Zach Werenski's assist.
Goalie Connor Hellebuyck shines with 41 saves, including crucial stops against breakaways from Canadian stars.
